# Socio-demographic and economic characteristics 

## `Face to face contacts with relatives`


### Description of DataSchema variable `Are face to face contacts with family members/relatives frequent (i.e. contact once a month or more often)`

The description of harmonised variable is the following:
  
* Name: `face_rel`
* Label: `Are face to face contacts with family members/relatives frequent (i.e. contact once a month or more often)`
* Type: categorical
* Categories: 
    + `0 = no`
    + `1 = yes`
* Missings: 
    + `991 = CAPI/interviewer error`
    + `992 = Impute`
    + `993 = Disable to measure`
    + `994 = Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded`
    + `995 = Don't answer`
    + `996 = Not applicable`
    + `997 = Refuse`
    + `998 = Do not know`
    + `999 = Missing`


### KLOSA - Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variables

The study-specific variable elected to be harmonised is:

* Name: `w01Ba13_01` UP TO `w01Ba13_10`
* Label: `The frequency which 1st child meets(in person)`
* Categories: 
    + `1 = Almost every day`
    + `2 = Once a week`
    + `3 = 2-3 times a week`
    + `4 = Once a month`
    + `5 = Twice a month`
    + `6 = Once or twice a year`
    + `7 = Three or for times a year`
    + `8 = Five or six times a year`
    + `9 = Almost never`
    + `10 = Never`
* Missings:
    + `-9 = ???`
    + `-8 = ???`
    
* Name: `w01B031`
* Label: `The frequency which parents meet(in person)`
* Categories: 
    + `1 = Almost every day`
    + `2 = Once a week`
    + `3 = 2-3 times a week`
    + `4 = Once a month`
    + `5 = Twice a month`
    + `6 = Once or twice a year`
    + `7 = Three or for times a year`
    + `8 = Five or six times a year`
    + `9 = Almost never`
    + `10 = Never`
    
* Name: `w01B069`
* Label: `The frequency which father meet(in person)`
* Categories: 
    + `1 = Almost every day`
    + `2 = Once a week`
    + `3 = 2-3 times a week`
    + `4 = Once a month`
    + `5 = Twice a month`
    + `6 = Once or twice a year`
    + `7 = Three or for times a year`
    + `8 = Five or six times a year`
    + `9 = Almost never`
    + `10 = Never`
    
* Name: `w01B107`
* Label: `The frequency which mother meet(in person)`
* Categories: 
    + `1 = Almost every day`
    + `2 = Once a week`
    + `3 = 2-3 times a week`
    + `4 = Once a month`
    + `5 = Twice a month`
    + `6 = Once or twice a year`
    + `7 = Three or for times a year`
    + `8 = Five or six times a year`
    + `9 = Almost never`
    + `10 = Never`
    

```{r assign1}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'KLOSA_w1_face_rel','KLOSA.w01_main_e', 
                        variables=list('w01Ba13_01','w01Ba13_02','w01Ba13_03','w01Ba13_04','w01Ba13_05','w01Ba13_06',
                                       'w01Ba13_07','w01Ba13_08','w01Ba13_09','w01Ba13_10',
                                       'w01B031','w01B069','w01B107'), missings = TRUE)
```

```{r local1}
KLOSA_w1_face_rel <- opal.execute(o,'KLOSA_w1_face_rel')
Categorical_summary(var = KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_01, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(KLOSA_w1_face_rel, aes(x=factor(w01Ba13_01))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("The frequency which 1st child meets(in person)") + ylab("Frequency")
Categorical_summary(var = KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B031, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(KLOSA_w1_face_rel, aes(x=factor(w01B031))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("The frequency which parents meet(in person)") + ylab("Frequency")
Categorical_summary(var = KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B069, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(KLOSA_w1_face_rel, aes(x=factor(w01B069))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("The frequency which father meet(in person)") + ylab("Frequency")
Categorical_summary(var = KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B107, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(KLOSA_w1_face_rel, aes(x=factor(w01B107))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("The frequency which mother meet(in person)") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any variable is in 1:5 then 1`
* `there are -9 and -8 in variables w01Ba13_0i so recode it into 999`

R code of the ALGORITHM:

```{r harmo1}
KLOSA_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=KLOSA_w1_face_rel$id)

KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_01 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_01), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_02 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_02), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_03 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_03), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_04 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_04), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_05 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_05), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_06 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_06), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_07 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_07), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_08 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_08), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_09 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_09), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_10 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_10), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B031 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B031), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B069 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B069), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B107 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B107), "NA='-999'")

KLOSA_ds_w1$face_rel <- c(NA) # I think it is required
for(i in 1:dim(KLOSA_w1_face_rel)[1]){
  if( KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_01[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_02[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_03[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_04[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_05[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_06[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_07[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_08[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_09[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_10[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B031[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B069[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B107[i] %in% c(1:5) ) {
    KLOSA_ds_w1$face_rel[i] = 1 }
  else if( KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_01[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_02[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & 
           KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_03[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_04[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & 
           KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_05[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_06[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & 
           KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_07[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_08[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & 
           KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_09[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_10[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & 
           KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B031[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B069[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) & 
           KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B107[i] %in% c(-9, -8, -999) ) {
    KLOSA_ds_w1$face_rel[i] = 999 }
  else if( !( KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_01[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_02[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_03[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_04[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_05[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_06[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_07[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_08[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_09[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01Ba13_10[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B031[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B069[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w1_face_rel$w01B107[i] %in% c(1:5) ) ) {
    KLOSA_ds_w1$face_rel[i] = 0 }
}

KLOSA_ds_w1$face_rel <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_ds_w1$face_rel), "NA='999'")
KLOSA_ds_w1$face_rel <- labelled(KLOSA_ds_w1$face_rel, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```


#### Harmonisation algorithm
To recode the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:  

* `if any variable is in 1:5 then 1`
* `NA into 999`

R code of the ALGORITHM:

```{r harmo3}
KLOSA_ds_w3 <- tibble(id=KLOSA_w3_face_rel$id)

KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_01 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_01), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_02 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_02), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_03 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_03), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_04 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_04), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_05 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_05), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_06 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_06), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_07 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_07), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_08 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_08), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_09 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_09), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_10 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_10), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb021 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb021), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb059 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb059), "NA='-999'")
KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb097 <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb097), "NA='-999'")

KLOSA_ds_w3$face_rel <- c(NA) # I think it is required
for(i in 1:dim(KLOSA_w3_face_rel)[1]){
  if( KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_01[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_02[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_03[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_04[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_05[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_06[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_07[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_08[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_09[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_10[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb021[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb059[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb097[i] %in% c(1:5) ) {
  KLOSA_ds_w3$face_rel[i] = 1 }
  else if( !( KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_01[i] == -999 & KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_02[i] == -999 & KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_03[i] == -999 & 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_04[i] == -999 & KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_05[i] == -999 & KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_06[i] == -999 & 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_07[i] == -999 & KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_08[i] == -999 & KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_09[i] == -999 & 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_10[i] == -999 & KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb021[i] == -999 & KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb059[i] == -999 & 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb097[i] == -999 ) ) {
  KLOSA_ds_w3$face_rel[i] = 999 }
  else if( !( KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_01[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_02[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_03[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_04[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_05[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_06[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_07[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_08[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_09[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Ba019_10[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb021[i] %in% c(1:5) | KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb059[i] %in% c(1:5) | 
    KLOSA_w3_face_rel$w03Bb097[i] %in% c(1:5) ) ) {
  KLOSA_ds_w3$face_rel[i] = 0 }
}

KLOSA_ds_w3$face_rel <- car::recode(as.vector(KLOSA_ds_w3$face_rel), "NA='999'")
KLOSA_ds_w3$face_rel <- labelled(KLOSA_ds_w3$face_rel, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```
